titles: A needful corrective or ballance in popular government expressed in a letter to James Harrington, Esquire, upon occasion of a late treatise of his, and published as seasonable in the present juncture of affaires
author: Vane, Henry, Sir, 1612?-1662.
Harrington, James, 1611-1677.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Henry Vane. cf. NUC.
keywords: Great Britain --  Politics and government --  Early works to 1800.
